content.rendered:
You are cordially invited to the
Regent College London
Graduation ceremony
2016
On Friday 29th January, 2016. At 11.30am.
Refreshments will be served from 2pm.
On Friday 29th January, 2016. At 11.30am.
The Auditorium, Regent College London, Madison House, 24-28 London Road, Wembley,
Middlesex, HA9 7EX.
Please RSVP to the Student Welfare Officer by 15th January, 2016.
Email: krystle.pond@regentcollegelondon.com
Tel: 0203 697 2202
Dress code: Formals/Smartwear 
www.regentcollegelondon.com
